** different horizontal spaces
.
Thin space: -\,- \\
Thin space: -\thinspace- \\
Normal space: - - \\
Normal space: -\ - \\
Non-break space: -~- \\
en-space: -\enspace- \\
em-space: -\quad- \\
2x em-space: -\qquad-\\
%3cm horizontal space: -\hspace{3cm}- \\
%relative fills: -\hspace{\stretch{1}}-\hspace{\stretch{2}}-
%This text should now automatically be in a new line.
.
<p>Thin space: ‐ ‐ <br>
Thin space: ‐ ‐ <br>
Normal space: ‐ ‐ <br>
Normal space: ‐​ ‐ <br>
Non‐break space: ‐&nbsp;‐ <br>
en‐space: ‐ ‐ <br>
em‐space: ‐ ‐ <br>
2x em‐space: ‐  ‐<br>
</p>
.
